page.title: 06N. WILLINGHAM _ Continued
page.content: The steeper sides of the Wolds are liable to slip and this is countered by ploughing & drainage and this was done recently to an area known as The Clumps. THE CHURCH _ Parish Church of St Thomas is 12thC with 13thC Tower and there is a small Gallery. It is in Walesby Group of 6 Parishes and gets 2 Services a month with congregation of about 15. This small community has to work hard to maintain the Church. In 1985 Manpower Services Commission used to rebuild Churchyard wall and earlier the inside walls of the tower were re_ pointed and the interior of the Church replastered and redecorated. Until 80 years ago was private church of Boucherette family and had early links with Gilbertine Priory. C of E School closed 1953 now used as Village Hall for Social events &c.
